func_sig.description: Evaluate and solve mathematical expressions or problems using sympy for symbolic computation.
func_sig.name: evaluate_math_problem

problem_statement.description: The mathematical problem statement to be solved.

func_sig.description: Calculate the volume and surface area of a geometric shape given its dimensions.
func_sig.name: calculate_code_properties

dimensions.description: The dimensions needed for the calculation, such as radius, height, etc.

shape.description: The type of the shape, e.g., cone, sphere, cylinder.
